MAN.TITLE: TCL_UpVar
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: make a link from a tcl source variable to a tcl destination variable

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : string character contains the name of the tcl source variable.
string character contains the name of the tcl destination variable.
: a boolean %T if iti is ok.

DESCRIPTION.P: make a link from a tcl source variable to a tcl destination variable.

MAN.EXAMPLE: TCL_SetVar('Scilab','OK') TCL_UpVar('Scilab','ScilabBis') TCL_GetVar('ScilabBis') TCL_SetVar('Scilab','NOK') TCL_GetVar('ScilabBis') TCL_SetVar('ScilabBis','modified') TCL_GetVar('ScilabBis') TCL_GetVar('Scilab')
MAN.AUTHOR: Allan CORNET
